verbs.description: Op - ed : Republicans [V: have] stayed with Donald Trump despite his racist comments about Muslims and Hispanics and war on the nation 's intelligence community and now may get a payoff in the midterm elections from the president 's conservative decisions , says Joe Scarborough .
